meanings.definition: To make a harsh or loud noise while sleeping.
meanings.sent1: My dad snores loudly at night.
meanings.sent2: She snores softly when she's tired.
meanings.sent3: The bear in the zoo snores so loudly, it wakes up the other animals!
meanings.sent4: The old house snores with creaks and groans in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The engine snores as it struggles up the hill.

meanings.definition: The act of making a harsh or loud noise while sleeping.
meanings.sent1: His snores kept me up all night.
meanings.sent2: The baby's snores were adorable and peaceful.
meanings.sent3: The cat's snores sounded like a tiny motor running.
meanings.sent4: The snores of the old man filled the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The snores of the dog echoed through the house.
